Key:
I see. What a troublesome opponent.
All of these bullets will disappear.

Quite right. There are so many of them,
so many attacking at once, that it's such
a nuisance～.

Hm. You were the one boasting about how
easy this was going to be. Maybe you're not
as strong as you think?

My, my. How upsetting. This is no challenge;
are you putting words in my mouth?

Speak for yourself, Kurumi-san. This is
no walk in the park for me.

Oh, my. Now you've said it. Why, you're the
most confident person I know.

You're the last person I want telling me
that. You're always confident and in control.
Why are you so relaxed?!

You're annoying... Aren't you exhausted yet?
Just begone, disappear!

My, oh my. We're only just beginning.
We aren't the slightest bit exhausted, either.

Yup, too true. If you can't bear us toying with
you a bit, then maybe you're an impatient one.

Wha?! Their Spiritual power hasn't decayed
at all... Is this what Diva can do?!

Yes, of course. Now then, fate brought us
together, so let's work as a team.

Kihi... Kihi... Kihihihihi! I will show you the
ultimate stage.
Wha... I'll shut that blabbering mouth!

Even if there's so many of you, it's useless.
After all, check this out... Gabriel, Solo!
Wha... Why can't I move?

Aww, too bad. Even in your own dominion,
you can't brainwash us.

Piece of cake. If they're frozen, all I need to
do is pick them off.... Zafkiel.

This is nothing! You think these measly attacks
can phase me!
Oh, yes. That's right. Normal attacks won't do...
Normal attacks...?
If you require more, I'll give you more...
Zafkiel... Aleph.

Are they getting faster?! Rgh, this is...
Aaaaaagh!

Did I only kill one? Oh, my. Looks like I got
another one behind her too... Kihi, kihihihi!

Umm, Kurumi-san. If you squash them one
by one, even with all the time in the world, it
still won't be enough!
You're right... Perhaps I should ask myself"

Hands from the shadows... This is the power
of Nightmare!

No need to act so surprised, eh? You're
using a similar power after all.
Ngh... Why you!
Don't move, okay? Gabriel... Solo!
May I have the next turn, Miku-san?
Guess it can't be helped～. Just one, okay?
Yes...
This is... Rgh, I can still call reinforcements!
It's useless, you know? Gabriel... Rondo!
AAAAAAAAAH!
AAAAH!

Now then, the curtains are ready to drop.
Kihihihihihi!

Yes, Kurumi-san. Let's end it. Time for
the finale!
